Posts.Content: worriedinTexas wrote: HI Wonderful Ladies, I have always come here to talk with you ladies, so here I am again as I need some answers to questions.  My mom is Stage IV, diagnosed June 29, 2009 and last week Pet Scan & Brain MRI confirmed Brain Mets.  Tomorrow she will start radiation everyday for 4 weeks.  I just wanted to know if any of you ladies have had this done, and what can I expect as the side effects.  I have had her scrips filled for Nausea, and told her momma dont worry about your hair, you look like a million bucks either way.  My mom is ER+/PR+/HER2- "History has demonstrated that the most notable winners usually encountered heartbreaking obstacles before they triumphed.  They won because they refused to become discouraged by their defeats". Betty's daughter Donna-Houston Tx Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mom's Radiation worriedinTexas konakat
